nodes.text: Borkyne was a planet located in the Bes Ber Bikade sector of the Expansion Region.

In 2 ABY, Captain Dagon Niriz claimed that Jodo Kast needed an Imperial pardon for a mess made on Borkyne. This story was probably fictitious, since Grand Admiral Thrawn was in fact masquerading as the bounty hunter Jodo Kast in front of the crew of the Hopskip.
